Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM Siebel Oracle COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
Description : - Reverse Knowledge Module - Reverse-engineering knowledge module for Siebel. - Business Objects are reversed as sub-models. - Business Components are reversed as datastores with their columns and their constraints (Primary and Foreign Keys).
Restrictions : - This KM works only for Siebel on Oracle.

Mask used to filter the Business Objects to be reverse-engineered. '%' returns all the Business Objects.
Sample Business Objects' names : Account Customer Asset Business Campaign Employee Sales

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN (I_MOD, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE) values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D' , :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '0')

SELECT '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' FK_USER_NAME, SUBSTR(TRIM(BCF.NAME||' '||BOF.ROW_ID),1,100) TABLE_NAME, LK.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID||' '||BOF.ROW_ID FK_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' PK_USER_NAME, SUBSTR(TRIM(BC.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID),1,100) PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_LINK")%> LK, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BCF, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOCF, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BOF, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> REPO WHERE BO.ROW_ID=BOC.BUSOBJ_ID AND LK.PARENT_BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BOC.BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BC.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BOF.ROW_ID=BOCF.BUSOBJ_ID AND LK.CHILD_BC_NAME=BCF.NAME AND BOCF.BC_NAME=BCF.NAME AND BCF.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND LK.INTER_TBL_NAME IS NULL AND BO.ROW_ID=BOF.ROW_ID AND BC.TABLE_NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' AND BC.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>%' AND BCF.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>%' AND REPO.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' AND BO.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOF.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOCF.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BCF.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND LK.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL (I_MOD, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, 'ROW_ID', :PK_TABLE_NAME,1)

SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(BCF.NAME||' '||BOF.ROW_ID),1,100) FK_TABLE_NAME, LK.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID||' '||BOF.ROW_ID FK_NAME, SUBSTR(TRIM(BC.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID),1,100) PK_TABLE_NAME, F.COL_NAME FK_COL_NAME FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_LINK")%> LK, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BCF, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOCF, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BOF, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_FIELD")%> F, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> REPO WHERE BO.ROW_ID=BOC.BUSOBJ_ID AND LK.PARENT_BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BOC.BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BC.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BOF.ROW_ID=BOCF.BUSOBJ_ID AND LK.CHILD_BC_NAME=BCF.NAME AND BOCF.BC_NAME=BCF.NAME AND BCF.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND LK.INTER_TBL_NAME IS NULL AND BO.ROW_ID=BOF.ROW_ID AND F.NAME=LK.DST_FLD_NAME AND F.BUSCOMP_ID=BCF.ROW_ID AND BC.TABLE_NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' AND BC.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>%' AND BCF.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>%' AND REPO.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' AND BO.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOF.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOCF.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BCF.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND LK.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND F.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID

select bo.row_id SMOD_CODE, bo.name SMOD_NAME, 'MOD_'||upper(trim(nvl(substr(bo.name,1,instr(bo.name,' ')),bo.name))) SMOD_PARENT_CODE from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> bo inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> ro on bo.REPOSITORY_ID = ro.ROW_ID and ro.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where bo.name like '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC,COL_HEADING, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_DESC, :COL_HEADING, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '0', '1')

SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(BC.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID),1,100) TABLE_NAME, COL.NAME COL_NAME, SUBSTR(COL.DESC_TEXT,1,35) COL_HEADING, SUBSTR(COL.DESC_TEXT,1,250) COL_DESC, ATC.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, ATC.COLUMN_ID POS, DECODE(ATC.DATA_TYPE,'NUMBER', ATC.DATA_PRECISION, NVL(ATC.DATA_PRECISION,ATC.DATA_LENGTH)) LONGC, ATC.DATA_SCALE SCALEC, 1 COL_MANDATORY FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS ATC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_COLUMN")%> COL, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> TABL, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> REPO WHERE BO.ROW_ID=BOC.BUSOBJ_ID AND BOC.BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BC.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BC.TABLE_NAME=TABL.NAME AND TABL.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' AND BO.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>' AND REPO.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' AND BO.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND COL.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.ROW_ID=COL.TBL_ID AND COL.NAME=ATC.COLUMN_NAME AND TABL.NAME=ATC.TABLE_NAME AND ATC.OWNER='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>'

select distinct upper(trim(nvl(substr(bo.name,1,instr(bo.name,' ')),bo.name))) SMOD_NAME, 'MOD_'||upper(trim(nvl(substr(bo.name,1,instr(bo.name,' ')),bo.name))) SMOD_CODE from <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> bo inner join <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> ro on bo.REPOSITORY_ID = ro.ROW_ID and ro.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' where bo.name like '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW,SMOD_CODE) values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'T', :TABLE_DESC, '1',:SMOD_CODE)

SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(BC.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID),1,100) TABLE_NAME, TABL.NAME RES_NAME, SUBSTR(TABL.NAME,1,3) TABLE_ALIAS, SUBSTR(TABL.DESC_TEXT||' (TYPE : '||TABL.TYPE||')',1,250) TABLE_DESC, BO.ROW_ID SMOD_CODE
FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> TABL, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> REPO WHERE BO.ROW_ID=BOC.BUSOBJ_ID AND BOC.BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BC.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BC.TABLE_NAME=TABL.NAME AND TABL.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' AND BO.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>' AND REPO.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' AND BO.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID
insert into SNP_REV_KEY (I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(BC.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID),1,100) TABLE_NAME, CASE WHEN IDX.TYPE='Primary Key' THEN 'PK' ELSE 'AK' END CONS_TYPE, IDX.NAME KEY_NAME FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> TABL, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> REPO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_INDEX")%> IDX WHERE BO.ROW_ID=BOC.BUSOBJ_ID AND BOC.BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BC.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BC.TABLE_NAME=TABL.NAME AND TABL.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' AND BO.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>' AND REPO.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' AND BO.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND IDX.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.ROW_ID=IDX.TBL_ID AND IDX.ISUNIQUE='Y'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS) Values (<%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS)

SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(BC.NAME||' '||BO.ROW_ID),1,100) TABLE_NAME, IDX.NAME KEY_NAME, IDX_C.COL_POSTN POS, IDX_C.NAME COL_NAME
FROM <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSOBJ")%> BO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BOCOMP")%> BOC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_BUSCOMP")%> BC, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_TABLE")%> TABL, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_REPOSITORY")%> REPO, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_INDEX")%> IDX, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("S_INDEX_COLUMN")%> IDX_C WHERE BO.ROW_ID=BOC.BUSOBJ_ID AND BOC.BC_NAME=BC.NAME AND BC.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND BC.TABLE_NAME=TABL.NAME AND TABL.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>%' AND BO.NAME LIKE '<%=odiRef.getOption("BUSINESS_OBJECT")%>' AND REPO.NAME = '<%=odiRef.getOption("REPOSITORY")%>' AND BO.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BOC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND BC.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND IDX.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND IDX_C.REPOSITORY_ID = REPO.ROW_ID AND TABL.ROW_ID=IDX.TBL_ID AND IDX.ISUNIQUE='Y' AND IDX.ROW_ID = IDX_C.INDEX_ID
